title: Travel deals: 20 per cent off Park Trek's Kakadu, Nitmiluk and Litchfield trip
content:
Park Trek has an early bird sale on its Kakadu, Nitmiluk and Litchfield top end trip. Park Trek has an early bird sale on its Kakadu, Nitmiluk and Litchfield top end trip. Walk among monsoon rainforest, through sandstone escarpments and past ancient Aboriginal art sites.

There are also plenty of opportunities for sightseeing, swimming, bird watching, photography and wildlife spotting.

You get eight nights' accommodation in 3.5 star hotels with four nights in Kakadu, two nights in Katherine and two nights in Litchfield, most meals and snacks, a Yellow Water Billabong and Katherine Gorge boat cruise, boat cruise and more.

Book before September 30 to receive 20 per cent off.

2016 departures include June 30 – July 8 and July 11 – July 19.

The discount price is $2616 a person twin share.

See www.parktrek.com.au. The story first appeared on The Sydney Morning Herald.
